Name: Server Name
Description: Name of your server instance.

Name: Server Password
Description: Password of your server instance.

Name: Admin Password
Description: Admin password of your server instance.

Name: Max Player Count
Description: Maximum authorized amount of playes on your server instance.

Name: Server Region
Description: Server region to be displayed in the server browser.

Name: Game Map
Description: Starting path of the map you want to load on your server intance. The button contain a few known map path for easier setup.

Name: Sudo Super Admin List
Description: List of steam ID to be Sudo super admins on your servers. Leave it empty if you do not use Sudo.

Name: Disable Tot!Admin High Precision Move Tool
Description: For better compatibility with other move tools, disable two decimal scaling of Tot!Admin Move Tool

Name: Kill Zombie Servers
Description: Kill server instances that have stopped responding (frozen) for a period of time.

Name: Zombie Check Duration (Seconds)
Description: Amount of time given to a server instance to respond before getting killed by trebuchet

Name: Restart Servers When Down
Description: Automatically restart a server instance that have stopped unexpectedly.

Name: Maximum Tick Rate
Description: Maximum tick rate of your server instance.

Name: Use All Cores
Description: Supposed to improve performance on machines with lots of cores, unverified. Probably black magic.

Name: Process Priority
Description: Process priority of your server instance. Higher might make your server more responsive but at the cost of other OS processes responsiveness.

Name: CPU Thread Affinity
Description: CPU Thread Affinity help to assign specific cores to the server process.

Name: Game Client Port
Description: Port used by the game client to connect to your server instance.

Name: Source Query Port
Description: Port used by the server browser to query your server instance.

Name: Enable Multi Home
Description: Enable Multi Home to allow multiple IP to connect to your server instance.

Name: Multi Home Address
Description: IP address to be used by Multi Home. Usually your local IP.

Name: Enable RCON
Description: Enable RCON on your server instance.

Name: RCON Port
Description: Port used by RCON.

Name: RCON Password
Description: Password used by RCON.

Name: RCON Max Karma
Description: Maximum karma value for RCON.

Name: Enable Valve Anti Cheat
Description: Enable Valve Anti Cheat on your server instance.

Name: Enable Battle Eye
Description: Enable Battle Eye on your server instance.

Name: Display Log Console
Description: Display server live logs instead of a blank window. WARNING: This might render the zombie process detection ineffective. I don't advise using this on a production server.

Name: No AI Spawn
Description: Prevent the spawn of common map NPC. Some categories of NPC are not affected by this, like the Siptha vaults.

Name: Log Filters
Description: Filter the log console to only display specific types of logs. This can greatly help to reduce your log size. Log levels are NoLogging, Fatal, Error, Warning, Display, Log, Verbose, VeryVerbose, All (=VeryVerbose).
